text: Indu Bhushan Sinha is an Indian nephrologist and medical academic from the Indian state of Bihar. He is a former professor and head of the department of nephrology at Patna Medical College and Hospital. He has served as the editor of The Patna Journal of Medicine of the Indian Medical Association (1986–89) and is a life member of the Indian Society of Nephrology. The Government of India awarded him the fourth highest civilian honour of the Padma Shri, in 2008, for his contributions to medical science. == References == == External links == * * Category:Recipients of the Padma Shri in medicine Category:Scientists from Patna Category:20th-century Indian medical doctors Category:Indian nephrologists Category:Indian medical academics Category:Living people Category:1935 births Category:Medical doctors from Bihar
